long_description: Get clean, consistent and long-burning energy with this great-tasting complex carbohydrate gel from Hammer Nutrition. Proprietary Energy Smart(R) blend of long-chain complex carbohydrates delivers smooth, sustained energy release. Can be used straight, diluted or as a flavoring for complete versatility. Consume before, during and after workouts for increased endurance and quick recovery from exertion. Espresso flavor contains 50mg of caffeine per serving. Specifications based on a range of flavors; nutrition facts displayed here and on wrapper may differ; information on wrapper reflects actual contents. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Get clean, consistent and long-burning energy with this great-tasting complex carbohydrate gel from Hammer Nutrition.
